column5: Anyone else tuning in to the Vanier cup tonight!  I was going to channel surf between the Leafs and the Football game, but as I type this, Dallas scored! Gotta feeling that there will be more football than hockey tonight on my tv!  Go Mac Go!  Clarence
An upset would be nice, but not sure what the chances of that happening are.I guess the game just started,
Looking great, I'm not surprised that Mac can move the ball with a pro prospect at Qb, but I am surprised at how well their D is playing.

23-0 Mac at Halftime! Hopefully Laval doesn't wake up at halftime.  Laval is to good to go down this easy, could be a classic second half....but I hope not! Either way, I'll still be chucking spoons in the morning....   Clarence
My school is doin it!!!  GO  GO
two quick tds by laval 23-14 now
This game just got very interesting
mac answers back the very next play with a td lol
Nuff Said  Congrats MAC.....  What a great game.  Clarence.

What a great game it was!  I was thinking of flipping back and forth to other things on tv after half-time, however, I had a feeling Laval would wake up.  Boy did they!  2 quick td's and they started rolling.  Give them credit for coming back and taking the lead, but I was really impressed by Mac for not crashing under the disappointment of giving up such a huge lead.  If Mac's quarterback doesn't get drafted into the CFL I'd be very surprised.  He is clutch and cool as a cucumber and a good accurate arm.  Some of those throw's you just don't see at that level.  One of the best football games I have ever watched.
Mac QB thru for over 500 yrds and ran over 150 himself
I agree with everything you said. It was one of the best games I have ever watched as well!   And the Leafs won!  Kinda makes up for the Ticats lack luster game last week.  Clarence
Absolutely one of the best football games I ever watched, Mac and Laval played their hearts outs both teams should be proud of the games they played. Way to go MAC!

What a great game.  Couldn't have asked for a better result.  I was really pulling for Mac but Laval has a great program and they always know how to win. Great respect for Stefan Ptaszek as well.  He is a great coach and was a really good CIS player.  I used to play against him when he was at Laurier and I was at Waterloo. Her is a cool pic from a newspaper showing me (#8) about ready to hit Stefan Ptaszek (#14).
